Conjuration 6

Call Celestial Soldiers

Summon Units:#902 Celestial Soldier x 5
The Celestial Soldier is a being of the Celestial Sphere. It has the appearance of a horse-man in full scale armor, armed with a glaive. Celestial Soldiers are sacred.
